bioghist.p: John Price Jones Co., Inc., consultants for Institutional Financing and Public Relations, conducted surveys and consultation on strategic planning (financial, educational, scientific) for the Academy of Natural Sciences in 1935-1937 and in 1970.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of records related to the strategic planning consultation performed by the John Price Jones Company for the Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia. Materials include: reports of interviews with Academy staff and outside concerned parties; internal and external assessments of Academy departments, publications, and policies; daily reports of the J.P. Jones Company's activities; daily reports of subscriptions to the Academy; reports and recommendations from the 1930s and 1970s surveys and for specific planned programs ; correspondence regarding the surveys between Academy administration members and staff of the J.P. Jones Company, and with other concerned parties; copies of questionnaires, printed copies of the 1970 Master Plan Study; and a printed Phase I Capital Campaign Case Statement from 1976.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
